feed.title: Toshi Parmar /t̪oːʂiː prmaːr/
feed.subtitle: Building this site, bit by byte; briefly they live, burning chondrites.

entry.title: Welcome to my webpage!
entry.content:
Hi there!

I am slowly migrating my work here. In the meantime, have you made firends with Batuk yet?

I have a list of recent projects and writings up. Rest soon to follow.

It has taken me a while in my life to begin to collate all my scattered blogs into one cohesive tapestry. But I learned from my wiser friends that a patchwork collage is just fine.
entry.summary: Hi there! I am slowly migrating my work here. In the meantime, have you made firends with Batuk yet? I have a list of recent projects and writings up. Rest soon to follow. It has taken me a while in my life to begin to collate all my scattered blogs into one cohesive tapestry. But I learned from my wiser friends that a patchwork collage is just fine.
